Sentencas: A solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) is the most efficient electrolysis method, owing to the high operating temperature.
Titulo: Versatile thermodynamic design of a solid oxide electrolysis cell system and its sensitivity to operating conditions

Sentencas: Although high temperature electrolysis has lower electricity consumption, it also requires an amount of thermal energy.
Titulo: Versatile thermodynamic design of a solid oxide electrolysis cell system and its sensitivity to operating conditions

Sentencas: Thermal energy is supplied to the SOEC systems through internal heat recuperation and external heat integration.
Titulo: Versatile thermodynamic design of a solid oxide electrolysis cell system and its sensitivity to operating conditions

Sentencas: Thus, thermal integration is an important part of SOEC system design and operation.
Titulo: Versatile thermodynamic design of a solid oxide electrolysis cell system and its sensitivity to operating conditions

Sentencas: However, most SOEC system studies have focused on the electric performance of the stack, neglecting thermal energy consumption.
Titulo: Versatile thermodynamic design of a solid oxide electrolysis cell system and its sensitivity to operating conditions

Sentencas: This study presents a design procedure for system thermal integration.
Titulo: Versatile thermodynamic design of a solid oxide electrolysis cell system and its sensitivity to operating conditions

Sentencas: The SOEC system operable under all stack operating conditions (endothermic, thermoneutral, and exothermic) is designed.
Titulo: Versatile thermodynamic design of a solid oxide electrolysis cell system and its sensitivity to operating conditions

Sentencas: The internal heat recuperation is maximized by branching the cathode inlet and anode outlet streams.
Titulo: Versatile thermodynamic design of a solid oxide electrolysis cell system and its sensitivity to operating conditions

Sentencas: Then, an operating condition analysis is performed to analyze the effect of operating conditions on the proposed system.
Titulo: Versatile thermodynamic design of a solid oxide electrolysis cell system and its sensitivity to operating conditions

Sentencas: The system-level effect of operating parameters (stack voltage, stack inlet temperature, steam conversion, air ratio, hydrogen fraction) on the system's performance and thermal aspects is examined.
Titulo: Versatile thermodynamic design of a solid oxide electrolysis cell system and its sensitivity to operating conditions

Sentencas: The results of this study provide guidelines for designing SOEC systems and selecting operating conditions.
Titulo: Versatile thermodynamic design of a solid oxide electrolysis cell system and its sensitivity to operating conditions
